dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- GLAA
dmca.body:
P.O. Box 75265
Washington, D.C. 20013
202-667-5139

GLAA
Gay and Lesbian Activists Alliance

equal@glaa.org
www.glaa.org
Fighting for equal rights since 1971

November 3, 2006 

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043
Sent via: fax to 650-963-3255

RE: DMCA Take Down Notice

Dear Sir or Madam:

I am the Vice President for Political Affairs of the Gay and Lesbian Activists Alliance of Washington, Inc. (GLAA), which is the owner of the copyrighted picture of our president Barreft Brick, found on our website at hffp://www.glaa.org/officers.shtml.

We recently complained about copyright violations of a blog website owned by Google, http://fagboys.blogspot.com/. Our complaint was number #80005540. This blog again is publishing our copyrighted piture at http://fagboys.blogspot.com/2006_10_01_archive.html#6288838852401159728. The blog is operated by Jonathan R. Rees. You have had to remove numerous blogs that he has created.

This letter serves as GLAA
